lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So before we get started, let's go ahead and get a few announcements out of the way. One, for those of you who have been waiting extensively, because I know you have been. Tomorrow, on the website you will have the Snugglelord playlist will be premiering on GeekandSundry.com.

So if you haven't had a chance, go check it out and feel some holiday spirit to give, go ahead and pick any that are there or any of your own charities and do what you can to help. So, appreciate that guys. Also, the most recent comic went live for our Winter's Crest festival.

Upon fighting its will, it was jettisoned from his form and the party battled this deranged greater smoke demon-like entity in the center of this cavern. During this fight, Lady Briarwood tried to escape, however, found a dagger in the middle of her back, thanks to Vax over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stripped of her possessions, and then Cassandra dragging her into the nearby acid baths, tossing her body within to leave her story to a definite conclusion. Scanlan, being very astute, apparently, in some observations, and as convincing as he can be, managed to wrestle Percy's weapon, his List, his Pepperbox, from his grip, and tossed it into the very acid pits, destroying his greatest creation and in doing so, seemingly breaking whatever hold this shadow demon had on Percy's soul.

lines.text: Some justice was doled to a few survivors of the Briarwoods' regime. And you were asked to stay behind to help rebuild and prepare for the coming Winter's Crest festival, of which you agreed. A few awkward moments and a few delightful bits of interpersonal comedy brought you guys to this point and now we begin tonight's session of Critical Role. So, to start off, leading up to this Winter's Crest festival, about a two-week period, what would you guys like to individually do in this time to prepare for the festival?

You come by, eagerly lifting, carrying, dropping, slamming, and holding in place extremely heavy pieces of stone and masonry. In some cases, putting a few of the local strong men to shame and some of the local ladies, very blush-worthy in your presence. You are very happy. Go ahead and make three strength checks for me.

You find at the end of the week you are granted a small pouch which contains 315 gold pieces as a thanks from the locals for all the help both in the rebellion, the freeing of Whitestone, and for your feats of magnificent musculature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or give it to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have armor, dude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes an armor slot.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make that work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you totally could.

lines.text: You can certainly try. It would probably ruin the enchantment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if you don't cut into it?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to mostly for the rest of the time, keep to myself and Trinket and I'm going to help the townspeople rebuild a bit.

lines.text: I am also going to keep to myself and I'm going to talk to the people in town, see what businesses are open or trying to open, see what they need. And I would like to talk to Percy, since I don't know anyone here, about who I could talk to about getting messages to Emon, and I would like to get a message to Gilmore, to see if he can fill any need here. If trade is so ruined here, that Gilmore could be a help. And Gilmore gets another front, a place to do business and actually do good in a place that needs it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gilmore's Glorious Books.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over bits of a period of discussion, for the most part, any sort of non-official courier service has been negated in the town. However, there is now a glut of people that are, after the devastation, especially the ensuing rebellion, folks that need work and need coin and there are many individuals that would be more than willing to, for a handful of gold coins, make the journey to Emon delivering any messages you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I will write a message to Gilly and say that they're hurting here. They need trade, all the supplies that he's able to supply and tell him that this town is about to explode and is definitely a good place for his wares.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to break up with him in the letter too? Are you going to tell him that you're going to break his heart as soon as he writes you back? Is that what's going to happen? I'm sorry, I'm just looking at your letter as you're writing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm avoiding everybody except for Percival, who I've been asking advice from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you also have the cloak? Did you take the cloak?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have the cloak, yeah. Yeah, dibs on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fine pickings off the corpses of the two major villains of the previous arc.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More corpse picking to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! You have so many cloaks, though. Why do you need another one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's opening a cloak factory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gilmore's Glorious Cloaks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cloak hoarding over here. All right, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wanted to do four things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're residents of the town and there was an evil. That's all. So, I'm looking for a publisher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good. There may be a grand opportunity at the Winter's Crest festival to perform this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh-- gulp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disney and Capcom will be calling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also wanted to make sure that we were using the treasury, coordinating with Percy to open a library for the people to help them rebuild their place, which sounds like Vax is already on. I also commissioned a portrait of myself. I don't know if you-- I found a young artisan in town that I paid him some coin to paint me something that could possibly hang in the keep, at Greyskull, in the dining room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, sir, can I help you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, hello. My name is Scanlan Shorthalt. I was the leader of the rebellion that just defeated Lord and Lady Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! The pleasure is mine." He is now averting his gaze and almost bowing his head like you're royalty. He's very flustered and flushed by the sudden appearance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hear you are a budding artist and I am, if nothing else, a supporter of the arts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My talents are far unrefined and nowhere near powerful or "decent enough for your attentions."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a friend of mine. I'd like her on the back of the horse, arms around my waist, looking super hot. If that's possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. Only because he's so down on his own skills.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're telling this tale, he goes from bashful and meek to staring off in the distance, the artistic inspiration rolling through his head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Sorry, 31. I was wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No charge."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please, I insist. I must give you something for your troubles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever you deem fit, Sir Gnome, but I--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your name, young sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jameson."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jameson?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like this guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think everybody does-- until they don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Heartwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can do this for you, but please, if you could keep this between us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'm aware that some people like to be discreet about things and that's all right with me, too. Then I'll pay you the going rate for portraits of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. How large would you like it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big is the wall at Greystone Keep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depends on which area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dining room wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) That's like Sistine Chapel!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your dining area's probably about 12 to 15 feet high.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: High? Okay, and wide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wide? I'd say, off the top of my head, somewhere between 40 and 50 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'd like to leave room for other artwork, as well. We'll say 20 by six.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) 20 by six?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's half and half. 20 wide, six high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes go wide and he nods and says, "This is a challenge. But I believe I do know someone "whom I can order such a grand canvas from. This can be done. This can be done." And you see he smiles and takes your hand once again. "This can be done."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, sir. Jameson, was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jameson, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have done a noble deed for your people and for the rebel forces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eclipsed by the deeds you have done, Sir Gnome."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rushes off to prepare himself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then, one last thing. On a serious note, I do some research to see if me, or any one of my party could, over time and with great effort, learn the skills required to utilize a teleportation circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an arcana check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. Arcana? 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After asking around, you find there once was a teleportation destination circle in Castle Whitestone that was part of the network of Tal'Dorei, in Emon, but has since been destroyed and sundered and has been for quite some time. You imagine probably when the Briarwoods came, it was deemed a dangerous little loose thread. So, over the period of the next week or so, best you can ascertain is that type of transportation here is going to be probably not likely, at least not with the resources you have at your disposal. You may have to travel elsewhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not a skill I can learn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a spell you could learn, but that would be something you would have to swap out as you level up or choose as your spell progression down the road.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I find it's better to travel the world rather than use fast travel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I agree. You see so much more of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You miss everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All the artistic--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every nook and cranny, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do, as part of your group's discussions throughout the week, discover that Keyleth does have long-transport capabilities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, hello Keyleth. Fly the friendly skies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to explain what you can do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Teleport via Plants. So I can bamf through the Sun Tree. We can all--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You mean like a big plant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It opens for six seconds, a portal--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For one round, I can be like, this tree is a portal and we walk through the tree and it goes to another tree as long as I know of that tree's existence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's the same size, right? It has to be something of the same size? Or it can be any tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has to be walkable body-size.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A large or larger tree as far as this size.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket and Grog-sized trees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds like it would be the quickest "root" to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a tree in your garden back at Greyskull?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is. I made sure there was a nice--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Big old fatty tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big old fatty oak tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's actually two large trees, I believe, in the Sarenrae temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I forgot to say what else I wanted to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, because of that flying potion, I wanted to try to do some research and see how much flying potions are, if there's any kind of items that can make you fly whenever you want?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She liked it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really liked it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) The first taste is free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I mean, I know the carpet's gone, but maybe there's like an individual sort of item that's less expensive than a flying carpet, I don't know. Just wondering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have the flying potion--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I downed it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, the card I gave you for it. Because that would contain the cost of that particular one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have a robe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, but I want a bunch of them, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which you can have made or possibly look about to have purchased. This town is pretty thin as far as--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magic stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Most of anything of worth, of an arcane nature was confiscated and utilized or essentially melted down for its residuum components as part of the creation of the ziggurat, in preparation for their ritual. So, other than the items you were given when you first arrived here, you're hard-pressed to find anything in this town of that type. But asking around, there are enchantments that can gift flight, but they're pretty rare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Talk to Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore would be the person to talk to about that. You good, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, Keyleth is very confused as to why everyone seems to be avoiding each other. It's odd. Everyone's so standoffish. Anyway, Keyleth is going to go help the farmers and try and maybe help revitalize some of the land and help with planting crops, and helping out there. She also wants to make sure all the local kids are taken care of. Any kids that lost their parents in the rebellion. Lead the charge of making sure the kids are taken care of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, through your aid specifically, being a druid of your nature, you prepare this for probably one of the finest harvests that Whitestone has had in quite a long time. Even though it is deep winter, they're already seeing early spring growth through your aid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope. Climate change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's crazy. Vegetation and vegetables that are withstanding and still able to grow through the frost in the mornings, as the cold weather is coming from the winter, so you're raising quite a strong crop. Well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll have Thanksgiving in about nine months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the orphans, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the orphans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to spend most of my time organizing the affairs of the castle and the local government and making sure that there's institutions in place, getting rid of anybody who might still have sympathies towards the Briarwoods. Helping re-establish the Zenith and the Ladies' Chamber. Spending some time with my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra confides in you multiple times that she is nervous, that she, especially given recent circumstances, her recovery of her Stockholm syndrome with the Briarwoods, is not confident that she would be able to lead on her own. There is a moment where she apologizes extensively to Archibald. Archibald, who did survive, and was her direct contact in the castle, takes a few days before he will even face Cassandra when he is told that she essentially had been leading him astray and spearheading the death of the previous rebellion. You also discover the reason the various new nobles that were prepared for your ambushes were because Cassandra had gotten information about that from Archibald and then fed it to the Briarwoods. But you do sense a very, very deep-seated regret and an urge to make amends for that from her. And because of that circumstance, she doesn't feel like the people of Whitestone, who would have this information, which you haven't told anyone. There is no large-scale announcement. The only people that know about Cassandra's current situation with the Briarwoods are you guys, Keeper Yennen, and Archibald.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Archibald's still around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he betrayed us?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cassandra betrayed him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cassandra played everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. All right, I'll let him live.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, glorious leader. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just part of the team, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is an ongoing discussion. As far as establishing the structure, there's been many talks, but nothing has been fine-tuned, and that may play itself out as part of the festival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have two items that I would like to look at. Well, I have three items that I would like to look at. Sylas's sword and his amulet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The brooch that he left behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brooch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis has got you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really, Travis?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's our runner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, ho ho ho, and all of that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it, what is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it amazing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's standing there like Guile before a Street Fighter match.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hasn't heard of that character.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) What is it? What do you have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's pretty cool. It's called a Brooch of Living Essence and it basically masks the wearer's alignment, essence, whether they're good or evil, they can't be seen by Detect Magic spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the worst thing for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not anymore!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm unsure. It's hard to tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather that this item in particular was used by Sylas to travel through magically protected areas without giving up his undead essence or being read for his true intentions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's for a shifty bastard. It's definitely a shifty bastard thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's for Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, me? My alignment's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but it could be good if you want to pretend to be evil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either this or Vax. This would be an interesting thing for either--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't protect you against Detect Magic spells. It protects you against Detect Good or Evil spells and magic spells that reveal your true nature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True nature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be a good thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you could pretend to be bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you have in your-- brooch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My brooch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's in the neck slot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing in your neck slot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounds so disgusting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What have I got in my neck slot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the brooch slowly press deep in his neck slot (laughs). God. Ugh. Don't turn that into any fan fiction, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't say that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Percy, what else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a big piece of paper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a rather big piece of paper for a sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Ripley's gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a while to, not necessarily attune to it, but put enough of your attention towards it where you sense its magical capabilities. As it begins to clarify, where one voice before was not there, a new voice speaks and says--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shushing noises) This is important.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You, are you my new wielder?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got a talking sword!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's with you and fucking weapons, man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whimpers)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be strong, Percy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then leave me until one worthy lifts this blade."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gently put it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a sword that has a name!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what to do about this (laughs). This is really disturbing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step away from the blade, you can feel the air nearby is generally colder in its presence, and where previously it was just a weapon, you can almost feel like there's something looking at you. There's a presence just bent towards you, expectantly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's creepy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whimpers)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just try it out! What could go wrong?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to become evil, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can tame it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Wow--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't do it, Percy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I should tell any of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade sits there on the ground where you leave it, whatever you wish to do with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to put it in the Bag?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, you've given me so much to think about. It's really unfortunate. I'm definitely going to take at least a week of our two weeks to think about the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you going to do with it in the meantime?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sleep on top of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sleep on top of it. It's in my room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want it in the Bag?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What purpose has a blade that goes unused? I will remember this." Then it falls silent after a few days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The silent treatment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's sulking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a two-handed sword or a one-handed sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a greatsword. It's two-handed, big old Final Fantasy 7 sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Evil Grog is not a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the thing that's fucked up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know, which is why I shouldn't have given him that brooch. Goddamn it. I may ask for that brooch back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you think on it, the weeks pass--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I had a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, what did you guys want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also wanted to work on Ripley's gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. The gun itself is essentially a baseline pistol. If you look in your archetype for your fighter class of gunslinger, the pistol mechanics all apply to that weapon. Beyond that, nothing in particular. It's just her first successful attempt in recreating a firearm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to start making some ammo for it. And I'm going to work on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, whenever you get a chance, could you, maybe-- how hard are those exploding arrows to make? Super-duper hard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a terrible person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You picked up the sword, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, how's that sword working out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little big, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it? Look, I have this one-handed Dragonslayer Longsword if you want to get used to a bit of badassery before you move up to the big leagues. I know you've got that dinky piece of shit you've been using this whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just as a note, too, a greatsword is a strength-based melee weapon. Dex does not play into it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, which is-- well, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on whatever your strength is. What's your strength, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would probably not do very well with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why I was thinking about having it cut down and melted down into something more useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is also viable, if you wanted to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Dragon-slayer Longsword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, this is actually pretty badass if I did give it to Grog. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trade!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus Christ! And he's not even going to say anything about it. You're a terrible person, not Matt, you are. He gave you the device and you used it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've been playing D&D for years. You know what this means!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let you know we should keep an eye on him, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Grog. As you take up the blade in your hands, you hear coming out of the ether, a gentle, low velvet voice caresses the inside of your head saying, "You, are you to be my wielder?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Speak your name, warrior."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Warrior Grog, have you taken up the blade of Craven Edge?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that what this is? Do you have a female setting? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a long, drawn-out sigh. "Do you accept my power?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a power that comes with you? What kind of power?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you enjoy drinking the strength of your foes, watching them beaten before you, and have "that very power become your own?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you wish the shadows to encase your form and grant you resilience and anger, forcing those "to kneel before you in fear."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The shadows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you accept, Grog?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then it is done. Together, we will accomplish great things."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a name? Do I call upon you? Can I call you Bacon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You call me Bacon and this blade will cut the very hand you hold. My name is Craven Edge. It "will do you well to remember that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Yep. Was totally kidding about the bacon, Craven Edge. Well, I'm excited about this partnership. Clearly we will be a force to be reckoned with. By the way, can other people hear you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Silence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He will kill me first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is an amazing sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't even read it yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You haven't read it yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I can't read! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to read it so bad!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't let anybody read it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so magical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me a bear cookie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a clue as to what it can do based on when it was used against you by Sylas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it was badass. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, anything else you want to accomplish before we close out on the rest of the week?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we assemble a team of magic--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To take care of the thingy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that we needed to-- we all need to take care of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The marble of death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, throughout the week, Keeper Yennen, a few of the low-level arcanists that exist here--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't we send for Eskil Ryndarien?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sent for him, but you know information right now travels at the speed of whatever it is you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By mule?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At speed of mule.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When they return, Yennen is at a loss. Most of them don't quite understand the nature of the magic there. It seems to be immobile. It seems to be completely either negating, consuming, or preventing any sort of magical force within a specific radius of it. A lot of their normal arcane methods of inspecting or divine methods of inspecting this site are not functional. This is more like bring old tomes and research historical records of things that may be similar to this. So when you bring up that you had reached out to Eskil Ryndarien with the information you had, you gather that will probably be a much more fruitful endeavor. As of right now, no one has any clue what this is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we searched the Briarwoods' library that they had gathered together that say anything about--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's reminding you a little bit of the awkwardness you had with the last Winter's Crest in Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be on the lookout for eggs, giant frosty-looking eggs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way towards the Sun Tree and there you see Keeper Yennen is in the process of speaking with a few of the people that helped him with this entire rebellion, in setting up this event, and he greets you all as you approach. "Oh, my friends! How wondrous. Glad to see you are all "wakened and ready and well rested, I assume."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Glorious. Well, this is a day of celebration. We've taken the time and mourning "shall continue as needed, but today, today is to embrace what it means to be alive, to thwart the "darkness and the evils that press upon the free folk of these lands. And of course, to eat and "drink until you are full and drunk." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cheers to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It will be a little bit before we get to the actual celebration speech, but in the meantime, go "free yourselves, drink, be merry. There are a few events going on around you." And he points in a few directions, and you can see around you there are tables set up, there are individuals playing games. Immediately to the left, you can see there are two long tables set up and a stack of pies off to one side, looks like an eating contest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't eaten for a full day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In preparation?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see what looks to be a gentleman with a high box, with a very, very fine waxed mustache that is currently doing parlor tricks and magical presentations for people who are trading coin to be astounded with his illusions. You can see what looks to be a series of tables behind the Sun Tree heading towards the southeast side of it. You recognize better than anyone: these are central tables, relatively small, with a chair on each side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Craven, I think-- oh wait, that's arm wrestling. Go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sigh is getting more and more impatient.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He'll get used to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So these are the three first events you come across in your immediate vicinity. What would any of you guys like to partake in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see the magic tricks and go (loud gasp) and run over, without saying anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tag along.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'll go in for this one as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! I'm sorry, the ball has escaped your vision once again." And they all they cheer. He lifts the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps), are you a wizard? We've met a few wizards. No, are you a sorcerer? Because you don't look like a druid. This doesn't look like natural magic. What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I can play tricks on your mind, your mind, "your mind..."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) No! God, we've been through way too much of that here lately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's entertainment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Playful! Playful illusions, not against..."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just a game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Carry on. It's good. She's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep her in check, please. You're scaring the children."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not real. It's a game. It's going to be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Okay. I don't trust this guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry. Why don't you have Percival take the first turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm also a diviner. I can look into your eyes and see your very future."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not really. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For a simple gold piece, you can test your skills against the transference of this ethereal "ball. Or for five, I can look into your fate."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (starts hyperventilating)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do both, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ha ha. All right." Takes the gold piece.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab him by the scruff and I say, if you hurt him... You don't know what he's been through, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's fine. It's all right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you working with the Briarwoods? Did the Briarwoods send you?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can you please get her off of me?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, kids, this is why you shouldn't drink during the daytime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do your magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, sir." Takes one gold piece off, sets it aside. "Now, the ethereal ball. This was "taken from the Far Realms themselves, crafted in the ivy-covered hills in the far North End, the "Feywild itself. How could you follow this, with but your simple vision?" He places one cup over it, two cups to the side and begins shifting and shifting. Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, him? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, where is the fey ball?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say it's to your right, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you sure? It could be anywhere on this table."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could, but it's there. Because it's not anywhere else other than there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not so sure about that, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you're welcome to go in, if you like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I choose the one on the left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll have to give him a gold coin, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. (ding)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you wish to choose for this one instead, then?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm choosing on the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you five gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lean into Percy and I say: this guy's not a threat. He's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I am a dark evil demonic creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you wanted to know your fate."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Step forward, young-- what's your name?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He closes his eyes. "Yes, yes, I can see into the "very nature of your existence. You, young-- Percy?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Percy, Percy. Young Percy. You, you have hardworking hands, you've seen a lifetime of hard, "hard work in the fields. But you wish to make your father proud, as does every son and you "will-- as one day you will become... a well celebrated smith of horseshoes! "Yes! Glory to Percy!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing! So accurate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So accurate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans in and says, "I could tell from the black powder on your hands that you've worked with "a few pieces of iron in your time."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very astute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "Thank you so much. So, who's next?" The children start rushing up and-- you guys wish to continue with this guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll leave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've seen enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, who's doing what now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anyone want to get down to the pie contest? I thought I might arm wrestle first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you should arm wrestle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, I want to see this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to arm wrestle, in case I need to eat my way out of sadness with pies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turn your sadness into victory.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will also enter the arm wrestling competition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Show that you yourself are responsible for the "rebellion succeeding." Sees you. "You! You wish to be part of this, yes!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, very well. Ah, entry fee--" She leans in and gets real for a second. "Entry fee is "25 gold pieces each. Winner gets free drinks and the pot."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I slap down 25 gold on behalf of Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (excited gasp)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're paying for his entry?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm paying for his entry, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And mine, as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to-- I would also like to compete.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (prolonged high-pitched giggle) "Sorry. 25 gold then."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no offense, I just-- it's a cute beret."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other individuals come and enter and you can see as you guys are preparing for this event, you hear the rattling of chains nearby and you can see two guards stepping up with--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other goliath!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goran Vedmeyer, who you've seen--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Duke!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no longer Duke. Un-Duked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once you Duke something, you can't un-Duke it, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's been thoroughly un-Duked, trust me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Duke that was formerly known as--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Duke Gonad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I don't see why not, I suppose. All right!" Other people end up gathering up their change and she goes over the sheet with one of her compatriots and they end up breaking off into teams. There are four tables set up and for this round, at least, this part of the festival, they break up in different parts. She calls out to one table. "All right, we have a Jasper Leer to go against a Scanlan Shorthalt at this table."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay, Scanlan!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, shall we begin?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Can I ever-so-covertly say to him, you don't want to beat a gnome. You

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, go ahead and make a sleight-of-hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the worst. Shit. 13.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it mean? The eyebrows!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the phone came out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who knows? We'll find out when my arm gets wrenched off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Looking at Jasper's stats, I can tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, what are you talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's checking Twitter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, got to respond to a couple-- guys, give me a second. All right. So, he has his hand up, he looks you over with a look of intensity for a second. "Put your hand up."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: now!" Go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys stand there for a second (groans) his arm begins to push on yours, begins to bend back a little bit, you reflex with might and begin to set him back up to the center. You've reached a standstill, once again, back at the center. His expression on his face looks frustrated and surprised.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You weren't expecting this, were you? (pants) Neither was I!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not as good. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. At this point, as you say that, he tenses and forces down your hand now, right at three-quarters to the table. Make another strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. (groans) About to touch the knuckles--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is going on? I had-- This has never happened before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's keeping his hand to his side, trying not to grasp the edge of the table, which is technically against the rules. He's looking around at everyone watching and realizes the sheer amount of attention that's put on the fact that this tiny little gnome is now keeping him at a standstill.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shout out from the crowd, Scanlan! Pike is here! She's astral-projected in!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that moment of distraction, you look around and (wham) your arm hits the table. Cheers go on, everyone shouts happily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You idiot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the blood rushed somewhere else, that's not my fault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had him! (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He lifts up his tankard to the side, someone begins pouring ale into it. He shouts his victory out, everyone cheers. The barmaid pats you on your back. "You did good, you did good."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't need your pity! Grog, kick this motherfucker's ass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still in partial armor, has been guarding the event, has taken her helmet off to be part of this event, taking a moment to relax. She goes up against another merchant of the town and just destroys him. The next bout is a man who, the way he's dressed, appears to be a blacksmith. He still has his leather gauntlets on, he takes them off at the table, takes off his leather apron and sets it to the side. Gets down and ready and looks around for his opponent and the two guards bring up the chained Vedmeyer, who then sits down at the table, the chains hitting against the sides of the wooden table top and coasting to the ground as they adjust. He puts his arm on the table with a thud, and has to bend over to even reach the other guy's grasp. You can see the look on his face immediately pale as he realizes who he's up against. It's two rounds and maybe 20 seconds tops before Vedmeyer slams him so hard you can part of the tabletop splinters inward and the guy brings his hand back with bleeding knuckles. He reaches over, puts his hand out expectantly. The barmaid hands him a tankard full of ale. He downs it in one gulp, slams it on on the table and stands back up again. He glances over at you and steps back into the crowd. The second round of the events go in. You are paired up with the gentleman who defeated Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kick his ass, Grog!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put him in a body bag!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I sit down and I say, I feel really bad for you mate. You know, my friend? He's got hand herpes... So do I.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20! 19 plus one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one on his part. He looks genuinely frightened and is about to back up and get the attention of the barmaid who's running this event and he sees the crowd around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, you're a farmer, right? You handle food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He spits in his hand, puts it out and grabs your hand. The barmaid once again. "And-- prove "your strength!" Roll a strength check. He has disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll another strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, he sees the grin on your face and gets his will back behind him and (grunts) forces you back to the center. Make another strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He (groans) slams you right over on the edge of the table. Make another check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Eight. (groans) Keeping you right in the middle. Make another check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hold up my hand and I use Minor Illusion to make it all dotted with herpes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances sidelong at your hand and (whimpers). I'm going to give him disadvantage on this one. All right, what did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's now looking at you, looking at Scanlan's hand, looking at you, looking at his own hand, he's really worried. Make another strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's slippery when the pores start to seep. That's a one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a disadvantage, he gets a two. You guys are at the middle again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Big struggle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage again, because of that-- though disadvantage is fading at this point. He got a 12. So yeah (groans), now he's back down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on Grog, finish it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasps) "Wash it! Wash it, please! Wash it, "somebody wash it!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, the cure for that is actually on my man Vax's groin. It's very magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Drink up, you've earned it, champion."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at Gonad over at the side. I drink it, chug it down, and hold up the finger at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He sits there and tenses for a second with a grin, as he growls, his cold breath in the cold Winter's Crest air dissipates up above him and he gives you a nod, the slow look of warrior intensity, but respect. You can see he's looking forward to hopefully this as much as you are, but he still has a battle to do himself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've spent the last ten minutes while he's kicking that guy's ass to find a soldier or somebody in the crowd to bet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A young boy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 200 gold on Grog. Somebody in the crowd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going around, you're hard-pressed to find somebody who at this moment in time is interested in betting any money against the goliath that helped save the city. You find one gentleman who seems a little interested and he gives you this sidelong, sleazy grin. "Tell you what, not 200 "gold, but I'll put 50 down."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not worth it. 75 gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Step away, halfie."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I heard it. I give him the evil eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's too focused on the current bout at hand. At this table, you can now see Vedmeyer and the woman guard sits down. Someone's like, "Oh, Trisha's wrestling."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her name's Trisha? Trish the Dish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of them-- first match, she pushes and gets the upper hand. A three-quarter view perspective, she's tensing herself, you hear the muscle tensing beneath the armor itself, the metal creaking as her whole upper torso begins to push into it. She begins to push it back--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Trish the Dish!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Trish the Dish! Trish the Dish!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. Fitting. It's a real pity, I was looking "forward to fighting you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, get used to disappointment, shithead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, his chains are tightened and the guards lift him up again off of his seat and he gets led off back into the crowd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, walk away, you beardless bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As everyone gathers in now, you can now see more discussions and people are starting to really place bets down now on the outcome of this circumstance. The barmaid comes up again. "You, "champion Grog, sit down. And you, champion Trisha, sit down. As the final round of this show of "majestic might happens now. Hands clasped, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I may, thank you for your service to this city. That last round was a true pleasure to watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her face goes from hardened to soft for a minute as she reaches out and clasps you, not hand in hand, but forearm to forearm, and gives you a solid shake. "I've done so little. You've done far "more. But we all must do our part to keep the city safe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But right now, I'm going to have to destroy you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kind of love Trish the Dish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I like her, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her clasp on your forearm slides back, keeping your hand. Both of you tense muscles, we're talking Predator vs. Schwarzenegger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (Schwarzenegger accent) Yah, what's the matter, Dylan? You guys ate too many pretzels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see her tightly bunned dark brunette hair, you can see these green eyes piercing through, looking straight into yours with a bit of sly smirk on the side of her face. You can see a little bit of a scar on the outside of her face that's longtime healed and you can see she's definitely seen her share of battle, just from the complexion and the intensity in her face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's one of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the final round, let this show of might begin!" Strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the moment of tension hits, you can sense there's definitely a balance, both of you are keeping at bay. She cocks her head curiously and forces you down to the three-quarter back position. Go ahead and make another strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Grog! Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's that sword's influence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's laughing in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She brings you right down to the edge of the table and you can see in her face, there's this genuine look of surprise, like she probably could have finished you, but she feels like there's a trick or there's something to it that she can't be beating you this easy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so surprised by what's happening. I use Intimidating Presence on her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. Go ahead and make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does this have to be during a rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12. I'll go into a rage for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) It may have to be. Let's see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Why weren't you raging the whole time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was hoping I wouldn't need it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you don't have to be in a rage for it, but you can choose to, if you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: it doesn't add anything to my strength roll, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 12 for intimidation? Well, what do you want to do to try and intimidate her? She's about to finish you off on this table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm like, oh! (grunts) and I bite down on my tongue and blood just starts to pour out of the corner of my mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, gross!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sees this, and her eyes go wide for a second. She pulls back and for a brief moment, you feel her grip loosen ever so slightly. Go ahead and make the next strength check with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. (laughing) It's unreal. 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other one was a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I'm glad you had advantage on that; she rolled a five. So you do manage to (groans) force her back up. You're still in a bad place, but you manage to pull out of that circle and you can see now her intensity hits and she realizes she's not going to go soft on you at all going forward. But as the blood pools down your chin, you can feel the iron-y taste swishing around in your mouth and you can see there's a little bit of a quiver to her. She's still spooked by this whole circumstance, but she's trying her best. Go ahead and make another strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's battle-worn. 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's good. She has disadvantage on these because of the fright. I'm giving her that, but even still, she still rolls a 17. What did you roll, total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're really impressed by this display she's giving you. Roll again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have advantage? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay. She forces you back down--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I step forward and I sing a song of inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you singing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sing, (sings) let's go raging now, everybody's learning how, come on on a rampage with me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on on a rampage with me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, take a d10 inspiration, as you hear the song break through the intensity and you know that Scanlan's presence alone in itself and his fine ditties means that you can do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine ditties!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show us your ditties!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With the ten inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another check. How long does that last?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. Hold on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should switch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, what are you doing?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I don't know! They're so low! It was all those free rolls during the two weeks when I rolled 20--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, do you really have hand herpes? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you this look--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is unreal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Of intense anger-- and her face softens and she gives you a nod of respect. (thud) Releases her grip and pulls away, holds her arms up, crowd goes wild. The drink is slammed in front of her, the ale swishing and spilling over the side. She takes it in one hand and slides it forward and hands it to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, she's a good lady.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are a true warrior and I hope you'll continue to protect this city with that strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I intend to." She gives you a nod, walks around, accepts her coin purse and steps back into the rest of the celebration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk away (coughs), coughing (coughs), trying not to cry. (coughs) I take my tankard and splash it on my face. Oh, it's just ale. It's just ale. (sobs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, Grog. Let's go get you drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, a courier comes up dressed in colors that are reminiscent of the courier service that travels through Emon, through Westruun. There's a certain type of overcoat they wear that gives you the inclination that they've traveled from nearby civilization. Steps up with a rolled up sequence of letters and a small box that is wrapped up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh look, the young boy you ordered, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's asking around. "Looking for a Percival and a Vox Machina. Percival?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're Percival?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm to deliver this to you." He hands you the small box. "I have here two small letters." And hands them over both to you. There's a small, thin one that is actually written to Percival, and there's one addressed to Vox Machina.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to sit here and watch you roll them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Presentation's lost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just noticed Taliesin's outfit, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were supposed to wear pajamas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wore my pajamas. My muppet pajamas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the week got busy and we forgot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want me in my pajamas because they're--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one's to you and the other one's to Vox Machina.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Letters, we've got letters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Perhaps it will prove useful in a difficult moment. In the meantime, I look forward to a "fuller account of your deeds reaching us in Vasselheim. A joyous Crest to you all. It seems "you have earned it. Lillith."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "P.S., Zahra sends her greetings."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (dreamily) Zahra.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The tieflings!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had quite a night together. Just braiding each other's hair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tuck the private note away and put it in my pocket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there's another one, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a box, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is it big enough to hold a giant carpet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps a small ice egg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about that big in your hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We open the box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open the gift. Inside, there are two--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check it for traps!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Make a reflex save-- no. As you open it, you see inside there are two crystalline stones that both identically look like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a while since we had a visual aid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's nice when you have a really good artist, apparently. But two stones like this. They are called Gate Stones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gate Stones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two stones are essentially linked. One is placed wherever you like and the other is kept with you. A single individual, just an individual, not a group, can take a minute to concentrate on one stone and be instantly transported to where the other stone is, with the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Badass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One-way ticket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take it with you and you can zoom back to wherever you left it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are two stones in this box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They are the two that are linked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A person or linked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there is a single set.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So this is a get out of jail free card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a bamf-in-Pike card.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's multiple situational uses for it, depending. But apparently this has been painstakingly either enchanted, constructed, and sent by Lillith for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're all from Lillith?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the letters and those two stones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From Lillith and Zahra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Zahra, both of them, essentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Lillith doesn't have the other stone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For a little arcane booty call?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think I've ever seen Percy giggle before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you blushing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. It's cold. Very cold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a new demon, isn't it? The blushing demon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was great, wasn't she?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lillith is a true friend. Zahra, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Zahra is great, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear murmurs now, people mentioning the pie-eating contest starting soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex and Vax!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, we'll give it a go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys make your way over there, we're going to go ahead and go to our break. We're at the middle point here, yeah. So it's going to be a longer break guys, because we've got a little present for you. I know for a while we've been talking about this work we've been doing on a pre-stream story of Vox Machina's adventures that you guys hadn't had a chance to really experience. So, through all of us doing our individual narration, as well as the wonderful Wendy Sullivan doing incredible work on 50 pieces of art for this, and using music from actually some of our Critters that sent us some great musical tracks, we have been able to present to you over the next 20 minutes, the story of Vox Machina, the beginning. So, enjoy guys, we'll see you here in a moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon destroying the abomination, the party returns to repay Fendril's deceit with a blade to the throat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pushing forward in the hopes of speaking with this archmage, the party accepts, and passes through arcane trap after trap to reach the top of the tower, deciding not to steal from the archmage but instead parley with him for his aid. The tower's keeper, Realmseer Eskil Ryndarien, agrees to help and sends the party to collect two items he requires for the ritual: the skull of a nightmare and the heart of a nymph. The caveat: their defeated foe is indeed a lich now, and in merely two weeks, he will be reborn within Grog! They travel north to the Umbra Hills, wrestle with a small cult to slay their infernal messenger and his nightmare steed, and find a fresh companion in Percy, newly freed from imprisonment. From there, the party rushes south to the Frostweald, a forest shrouded in eternal winter. Battling past basilisks, the party finds a single, unfrozen pool where they coax a nymph from her dimensional sanctuary. Talking their way out of battle, Grog enters the sanctuary with the nymph, and returns holding a jewel gifted by the beautiful creature: the "heart" of the nymph.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax, having previously been a member of the Clasp, knows the main headquarters lies within the capital city of Emon, and Vox Machina sets out for the west.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tiberius finds one of his prized artifacts and makes a dangerous deal to acquire it. The party barters for information on how to escape, which Trysta will give... in exchange for their aid in slaying a newly nested denizen that threatens her work. The party agrees, climbing to the very top of the Crystalfen Cavern to do battle with an umber-hulk. The fight goes south when Grog is tossed from the cavern ceiling, nearly dying upon impact with the island, but victory is eventually theirs. Returning, Trysta shows them a hidden staircase that exits into the Graveyard District of Emon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They discuss the state of things within the palace, how Uriel is a good and trusted man, but his actions (and those of the Empress Salda) are recently suspect. After seven days of being kept from the council chambers, she's about to give up and leave. The party tells her of their findings, and Allura leads them to her tower within the district to further discuss the matter in private.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog dives right in, rage-looting the gold, but the arrival of the party seems to call the attention of General Krieg, who appears at the teleportation circle. He angrily denounces the party and reveals his true form, that of a frightening blue dragon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They gather up the cold body of their fallen friend and rush her to a nearby temple of Sarenrae, where a resurrection ritual is attempted... and succeeds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: After an impromptu try-out, they settle upon their new hires.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello! And welcome back. I hope you guys enjoyed your little look into the past of Vox Machina. Once again, thank you to everyone who helped us with that. Huge thanks to Wendy. You were amazing in putting that together for us. It's been a long-time endeavor coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We love you, Wendy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And all the wonderful Critters that are incredibly talented put the music together and we are very thankful that you helped us fill out the soundtrack. If you didn't catch all the names, they're at the bottom of the credits and hopefully we'll have that video up separately on the website soon, so people who couldn't make it tonight will have a chance to see it for their own. That being the case, when the rest of them decide they want to join us, those who are going towards the pie eating contest. You start pushing through the crowd, making your way towards the two long tables that are set up. At this, you can see there are a pair of bakers that are standing there with stacks and stacks of various pies of various flavors they have been preparing, all different colors and shapes, just pushed into a pile, as people are gathered around, excitedly sitting at the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Trinket allowed to join in the pie eating contest too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You can ask.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, all right. So sit there, everyone's "got a table. We have room for about four more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, three more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a bear. Is there room for a bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A bear. Like, a bear?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but a very human-acting bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, sure. Bring him in. No! It's a bear! Two more, room for two more."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want me to join?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can someone transmogrify Trinket, quickly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Can you Polymorph Trinket, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Into what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A human.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To a hot man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To a lumberjack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into a lumberjack of a man?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think it works that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Old Spice commercial. Make it happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Winter's Crest magic!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I believe. I believe in the spirit of Winter's Crest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Polymorph Trinket into a man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan says he can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Scanlan actually might have a better chance with Seeming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can Polymorph Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But can you Polymorph animals into people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you could, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically. I don't see why not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fur, just fur--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Furry belly? What is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like that guy in the beginning of Barbarella.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you turned your bear into a

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brian Blessed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's my bear, right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather, Polymorph does not affect the intellect of whatever you transform.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab a mug of ale and go: another one, right? Yeah! He's had so many!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So drunk, this guy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. Grog, do we still have that helmet, that pot that you wore on your head, in the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we have that real quick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, okay. So I reach in and take out the big bronze pot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put the pot on his head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's special.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he has a helmet head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear moans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, have a seat in this chair like a normal human.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can give that back to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I keep giving him ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To eat..."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not have much confidence. You have always eaten more than me, always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now!" Dive in face first, arms behind you, just tearing through these pies. Just blackberries, strawberries, all forms of berries just being tossed everywhere. There's a couple chicken pies--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No hands, no hands!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No hands, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, no hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket goes like, (inquisitive grunt).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No hands! No paws!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) No paws! No paws!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Message to communicate to Grog: If there was ever a time for a prank, now is it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all tear through your first large pies, smeared across the faces, with your mind off to the side, you glance over, everyone go ahead and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Constitution? Oh, he's going to barf.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20, Natural 20!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you rattled the table, it was 15, then it fell over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry, Charlie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven for me, because he rattled the damn table, because he's an asshole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Separate issues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Trinket rolled a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm not eating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're not eating?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was just you two guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was us and Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right, cool. So, the three of you tearing through. You finish the first pie. The second pies slam down, you all look at it, you have a little moment. Close, but not too bad. You gather yourself and dive into a second round of pies, splashing all over the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I elbow my sister, then dive into the pie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growls aggressively)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really drunk! Don't touch him too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, just keep--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No hands, Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He lost half his family here, in the attack on Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More and more pie crust being tossed aside, the table is a mess. The bakers are starting to scoop off whatever is left over off to the side into buckets. As you finish the second pie, make another constitution saving throw with the DC increasing with each progressive pie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural one for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh boy, I got a big six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Trinket!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Luck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 for Trinket. I rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have Trinket roll another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Trink!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to inspire him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're adding your modifier, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're adding your modifier, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His constitution modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gulps, distressed growls) He gives you that look of like, (distressed growling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Buddy. You can keep doing it! I'll give you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Food?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I got nothing. A nice nap. You can have the bed tonight and I'll sleep on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pants) He looks over and another pie is set down, the fourth round of pies go down. The last three and Trinket join in. Make another constitution saving throw for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. It was almost a fucking 15. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 15? Total?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's sweat down his face (panting), you see the little bit of a chinstrap beard he has just covered in berries and bits of crust, this awful appearance. Trinket finishes the last bits of the pie (chomp, distressed bellow).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I feel so guilty right now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is he so good at being sad bear?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! Don't be sad bear, be happy bear!
