lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 300 gold!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just 100 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, a persuasion check for Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he'll keep eating?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, buddy. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Trinket looks at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (distressed growls)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're like a Toddlers and Tiaras mom right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. This is the worst. I'm the worst mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks down and across the table, the gentleman who's also there scoots over right in front and goes, "May the best man win, eh?" Trinket goes, (loud growl).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get angry! Eat angry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are bits of pie spattering across him on the ground. Two pies (thud) brought down in front. These are not fruit pies. These are meat pies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! That's so wrong!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, Trinket likes meat way more than fruit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then he goes, (distressed groans, sniffs).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a salmon pie? He likes fish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage, because it's meat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beause it's salmon. It's a salmon pie, and he loves salmon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pauses) Hold on. There do appear to be hints of fish inside. I will grant you advantage on this saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Fucking balls, mother bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did roll with advantage. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Both of them dive into their pies, coasting through. At a certain point, Trinket stops and (pants) breathes heavily in the pie. You can see bits of it over the edge, just from the nostril flare, looks up at you (distressed growl).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, buddy. It's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I instinctively move behind Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gentleman across the way looks up as well and is like (pants heavily, groans). They both dive into the pies together again, slowly, trying to make their way through and then in a moment, they both look up at each other and their eyes make a connection as a look of sudden fear and realization hits both of them. They both sit up and with but a moment's notice, the two bakers set down two pails at their side as both of them simultaneously just... buckets. Losing simultaneously, at which point both of them raise their other hand mid-expulsion. "We have a tie! A "victory! Both winners lasted quite a ways, splitting the pot, that's 50 gold each." Everyone cheers, yay!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Good job, Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (weary growls)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to eat anything else if you don't want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He gets to sleep on the bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get to sleep on the bed and I will sleep on the damn floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growls) Everyone goes like "Whoa-- " as he runs by and starts nuzzling you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this guy. This guy is so drunk!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was some mold in those pies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The baker hands you a sack of gold. "For your friend."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When he's feeling better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My favorite kind of pie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I come over to my sister with two big mugs of ale and hand one to her and say, here, don't swallow the first one, just swish around and spit it out, then the rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you can now hear voices start to raise, people going, "Oh, the Keeper, the "Keeper's going to speak." The people start gathering towards the center of town where the Sun Tree is. As you all begin to gather for this central moment of the festival, Keeper Yennen steps up. Cassandra steps up with him and you can see he's looking over the crowd, eventually meeting Percy's gaze.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cheers, everyone drinks, the music swells again, people begin to cheer and scatter and Keeper Yennen leads you guys off of the stage. The rest of you gather up as some people come up and shake hands and express their gratitude and thanks. As the crowd begins to die off a little bit, Keeper Yennen gives you all a look and beckons you over. "If you wouldn't mind, a moment "of your time. I think there are a few things we need to discuss."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the guards usher them away. You guys are led into an empty building, looks to have been a home of some kind that has long since been abandoned. As you step inside, it's cold and still in here, very low light other than a little oil lantern that's been lit by one of the guards as you step inside. The door closes behind and Keeper Yennen turns around. "There is no real way that we can show our appreciation for what you've done for "our people. But first and foremost, there are funds within the de Rolo family treasury left "behind by the Briarwoods that we hope could help compensate for some of your expenditures and 'hardships you've undergone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So many, just so many.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is, of course, at the behest of the de Rolo family, "who are the inheritors of this fortune."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival, you're looking very attractive today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very appropriate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would be natural, of course, for the people to, without question, follow anyone of the existing "bloodline." He looks both to Cassandra and to Percival. "Have you any thoughts on this matter? "Any of you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of our members, only this one human over here on his hands and knees, is the expendable one of our group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the strange, burly man on all fours, at this point, Brother-- who did not really notice, goes, "Is that your bear?" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Strange folk. "

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think any of us would-- well, Percy, if you'd like to stay and rule?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Freddy, this is everything you've worked for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is your birthright and you've earned it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was really not my birthright. I was not raised to rule.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you would be a fantastic ruler.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And also sometimes, those birthrights are thrust upon us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still have work to do outside the city. Ripley's still on the loose and knows far too much. And I feel more than a little responsible for her and what she may do. Honestly, Cassandra had a better upbringing than I did for this sort of work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Cassandra pipes up and goes, "Well, I understand what you're saying, brother, "but I'm still rediscovering who I am. If the people of this town knew what I've done, what I "was responsible for all these years."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mean surviving being held hostage, surviving an ambush and being pelted with arrows?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's difficult. Perhaps it's time for a council. Perhaps it's time for shared rule. There should always be a de Rolo in Whitestone, but perhaps we could share the weight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We could. I could."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yennen, would you be comfortable sharing some of this burden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'd have to ask the people, of course, of the city and make sure that that would be all right "with the folks, but I think given the way things have been, that shouldn't be too hard of a sell."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do the de Rolos still stay in the giant castle? Or does that go to somebody else, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the de Rolos keep the castle, but I think we use the castle to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, would you be on this council? And who would they be counseling? Is there no superior primate? Is there no, there's no--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe what he's suggesting is that we make decisions by council, by vote."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A triumvirate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you will."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quintumverate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, four people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A flatterdesplat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flibbertigibbit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A religious leader, someone from the farming communities, someone from the economic community, someone from the trade community--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone from the gnome community.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From the citizenry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the gnome community.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From some known community, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I accept.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interests will be thought of and there will always be a noble to be a tiebreaker when necessary and to judge from a place of (sighs) greater good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cassandra?" She steps back at this point and she looks, her hands shaking visibly. She looks up to you and steps forward and reaches up and puts her hand to the side of your face and looks to you with a piercing honesty and fear. She, lower lip quivering, whispers to you. "Percy, "can I be trusted? Do you trust me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give her one of the stones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were-- no, that was for the whole group! That was for the whole group, Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is this?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leave it alone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (muffled) That's was going to save your fucking life later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be so happy when we have instant access to the treasury.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anything bad should happen, if there's any need of quick retreat or quick communication, this is a one-way trip to us. And in return, this is a one-way trip for us to you, in case of emergency.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She clasps it in her hand, holds it to her chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were born for this. You were instructed in how to do this, where I never was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And now you've got four other people keeping an eye on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She smiles and closes her eyes. "What you say is true." She looks over at each member of your group and looks back to Keeper Yennen. "If it so pleases this intended council, It would be my "honor to represent the de Rolo bloodline in keeping this town safe." Keeper goes, "Then so be it. I shall inquire with the people of this town. We will forge a council "voted by the greater peoples of this place. And we shall restore Whitestone to its former glory. Very "well. Go, enjoy the rest of your festival."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that cash prize? You had mentioned some sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, talk with Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will organize--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you have to give it to us? It has to come from you? That feels shady.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not forget that within six hours of meeting each other, I ended up handing over an enormous sum of money to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was actually 500 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have it written down, don't you? That's so endearing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Enjoy your festival, you've earned it. Go out, be merry. Let us all remember "this time of year, the bonds that we carry, the loyalties that we hold to, and the heroism you "stand for. Now go." At which point, the guards open the door and he steps out. The cold air rushes in, and you can see now, quite a bit of soft snowfall is now coming upon the center of the town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anywhere nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points off to the side. There's a small bucket of cold water that's set by the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to dampen your outfit to the point of getting it off, although it is a bit cold when you step outside now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I follow him for a moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I haven't talked to you very much lately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you haven't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You seem a bit off. Yeah. What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing. I'm tired. We can relax for the first time in weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I noticed your girlfriend isn't talking to you. Did you do something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will tell you just about everything, but I don't think I want to talk about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I leave, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As the rest of the party joins, you all step out into the cold afternoon air. You are immediately greeted by the sound of music, laughter, and cheer. The rest of the festival continues on into dusk and you can't help but find the joy in the air infectious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I actually have a present for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it comes with a story.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're the only one I-- should we go get drinks? Maybe we should go get drinks first. Let's go get drinks and then I'll give you your present.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. In that case--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Alcohol makes everything better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Alcohol does make everything better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speaking of presents, even though you're being kind of a dick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow, you ran fast to catch up with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to buy you something, but then I realized sometimes old is better than new.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vox Machina's favorite!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Already dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you open the package, you see before you, a familiar belt of leather, with a coiled snake on the buckle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you get that?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got ways.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was in Uriel's palace, wasn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a really good winker, if you haven't noticed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you wink somebody for that? You slutty little thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello, Simon. (slithering sound) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, it's just a real snake, it's biting you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Revenge achieved!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am too embarrassed to look her in the eye, and stare for a moment, but then finally, still not looking at her because she's fucking freaking me out, pull her into a hug and say, I love you, Stubby. I'm never going to leave your side, I'm always going to be there. You can always be a pain in the ass like you are. I love you. Always have, always will. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. And then I slap him across the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck was that for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When I was helping the farmers clean up, I had this strange moment where I was walking through the field and saw a dead raven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) More or less. It caught my attention and it made me think about the past several weeks, what we've been through and everything. Don't know-- who knows, it probably died, actually, in the rebellion. Maybe my ice storm killed it or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're doing very well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we shouldn't forget.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a little macabre and I would have bought things, but we're out of money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I won't forget.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm glad that's not you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't even think of what the revenge felt like anymore. It's not... it doesn't weigh on me. Just regret.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Regret?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I will try to be better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's still a lot to come, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we all wish we were better than we could have been. Seeing that bird, I'm sure the bird felt the same way. But fuck it, he's dead now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) You're strange, you know that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we like it. Don't change.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm glad you didn't change.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, I got you an Amazon gift card. It's a forest called the Amazon. You can go there and get a gift.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it far?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, really far, you'll never use it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Re-gift!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No shadowy demons. Feels good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feels good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, Vox Machina continues to enjoy the joyous affair that is the Winter's Crest festival. Snowfall slowly covering the night sky as the sun comes to dusk. You withdraw to tell stories, sing songs, and drink merrily as the friends you are, looking forward to the next chapter in your adventure. And with that, we're going to go ahead and close the Winter's Crest episode of our adventure and leave you guys to the holiday break. We have a couple cool announcements to make. One, we had our winner earlier from our subscriber count, we hit a hundred. Our winner, if they haven't already announced it, is Saxecutioner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Saxecutioner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll get yourself a cool care package we're going to ship out to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the Boonzy Arts candle is going out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boonzy Arts candle. Scent-sy Saxecutioner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed, indeed. Let's see, we'll be gone for a few weeks until we come back for our next episode. We're on our holiday break, we're going to get our stuff taken care of, but we'll be back as soon as we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know what date that is going to be at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we come back next Thursday, right? Again, right? We play again every week. Every Thursday.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: The seventh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The seventh. And I think Zac has something you wanted to mention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you have a thing, Zac?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come on in, buddy.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Lucas will be taking over the commander-in-chief position, so Lucas!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lucas!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lucas!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Most people don't know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The man behind the curtain.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: The man that runs the boards. So Lucas is getting a promotion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: He's back there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I see his legs. He's not walking this way.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: There's no hard feelings at all. I'm not dumping a load of shit on him and walking away.

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: We'll figure it out.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We'll figure it out. Everybody, so thank you guys so much. I don't really have anything more to say other than thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Overlord, Overlord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you guys truly, as an audience understand exactly how much he's done to build this channel, the blood, sweat, and tears. I mean, both of them!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Literally, not figuratively.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zac has made us all feel so comfortable and so excited to create this whole thing and has given so much of himself and put so much of himself into this and really, if you have the opportunity on Twitter or wherever else to follow him to his new job, let him know and feel the appreciation. He's awesome and an amazing human being and we're going to miss him terribly. But we're so happy and excited for your new ventures.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm going to exit on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huzzah to Zac!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Huzzah! Huzzah to Zac!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's still going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's everything I hoped it would be!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's made of dice!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: What's on tap for next year?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you'll find out. It's all positive!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I have some suggestions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let us live!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to kill us all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will say, I feel like the DM power, the balance--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's over 9000!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's over 9000!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like if suns meet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Terrible things happen behind this.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Thank you everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks for coming, sincerely.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: No, this is magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll this for a second. I'm just curious.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Okay. Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 15. Oh wait. It's like a Sputnik die. So he rolled a 15. That's DM rolling right there. That's upper teens, yo.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I rolled a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seriously.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm going to use that one. Take that one back with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. So guys, next year, look forward to the next Dungeons and Dragons module, "Don't Be Sad Bear."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll be really great. For those who aren't familiar with Chris, he's been a longtime dungeon master inspiration for a lot of us out there, who's put up a blog for a long time with a lot of great tips and tricks and discussions on what makes a great story, what makes running a great game. If you aren't following him right now, you should, on Twitter at--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: @ChrisPerkinsDnD.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for coming.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I appreciate that. And guys, happy holidays and happy New Year. We'll see you--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I am going to get a tattoo to commemorate my year at Geek and Sundry here. And I would like that to be of you guys's design. So I'm going to challenge you guys on the internet to tag me and a week from today, I will Periscope me getting a tattoo that someone in the chat room designed. Most likely a Snugglelord; it'd be cool if it was a Snugglelord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure I'm going to draw you a cock and balls.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So, as long as it can be a cock and balls with Travis's face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll vote for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A big veiny triumphant bastard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about Snugglelord riding Travis's cock and balls?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You've been challenged. You've been challenged. But I definitely want to do that to always have with me a little memory from this last year. I really honestly can't tell you guys how much this year meant to me and I want to make sure that I will never forget, even if my brain starts to fall away. I'll be like, oh look, Travis's--

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Cock and balls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was so good at Halo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, nothing could possibly go wrong with that. So go ahead and get your designs together, submit those and see if you could be responsible for designing a permanent piece of illustrious Overlord's body. Wow. I'm excited for that now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's let the gates open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. You guys, happy holidays.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One more announcement. Sorry, I lied, one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is like Lord of the Rings. This is Return of the King. It's got seven endings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, well, it's going to be a double feature. There will be a finale to the comic strip of the Winter's Crest festival, so keep checking the Geek and Sundry website because I believe it's going to go up on Christmas Eve, actually. So yeah, check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still more stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Anyone else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there going to be a Critical Role marathon or something coming up soon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys playing Critical Role over the holidays?

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: At some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At some point, there'll be a marathon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What a perfect time to get your friends hooked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, it'll be on the Twitter.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Lucas will let you know when it's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lucas will let you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is a bajillion hours' worth.

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: I'll figure it out. I've got a week and a half to figure it out, but there will be a playlist coming right up. Next Monday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right! Good announcement! Good job! (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hail the new king!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: First announcement!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Well, I guess then we'll relinquish you guys to watch your Star Wars.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, actually--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys. Seriously, happy holidays, happy new year.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Happy holidays.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Happy Winter's Crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. Bye guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a snake!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See you on the other side.
